NAME: inviterank
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to configure the invitation rewards roles.
ALREADY_RANK_FOR_INVITE: There is already a role for this number of invitations.
INVALID_OR_MANAGED: Please verify that the role you mentioned is valid.
ALREADY_INVITE_FOR_RANK: There is already a number of invites for this role.
NO_ROLE_FOUND: This role is not configured as an invite rank.
NO_RANKS: There are no roles configured on the server.
DELETED: The role assigned to {{invites}} invitations has been deleted and is no longer accessible.
OPTION_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Add a role to the invite ranks.
OPTION_ADD_OPTION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: The role you want to attribute.
OPTION_ADD_OPTION_INVITES_DESCRIPTION: The amount of invites needed to get the role.
OPTION_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Remove a role from the invite ranks.
OPTION_REMOVE_OPTION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: The role you want to remove.
